description: This Persian style rice with cinnamon scented lamb is a delicious blend of sweet and savoury flavours.
name: Persian Style Rice with Lamb Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on a low heat with the lid on for 20 minutes, until the rice is tender. Tip out on to a plate, sprinkle with pistachios and coriander, drizzle with pomegranate molasses and serve.
